name: audiostreamerscrobbler
description: Scrobbles or sends meta-data of streamed music on Bluesound/BluOS, Yamaha MusicCast and/or Denon HEOS players to Last FM, ListenBrainz, Libre FM and/or GNU FM. Built for Raspberry pi-alike devices.
